title: What is the possibility of Google switching to be decentralized in the future? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would say the probability of Google being decentralized in the future is 1.0, which is also the probability of Google being decentralized in the present. It’s not possible to make a centralized computer program that a billion people can use at once.

A2A: The way I look it, the way they implement their services is already decentralized. See Google data centers - Wikipedia. The way that system looks to the user may appear to be centralized because that is the very nature of the services they offer.
